attributes.action: All social workers in Scotland to wear body cameras
attributes.additional_details:
Ardrossan social services- https://www.dailyrecord.co.uk/news/scottish-news/distraught-mum-tells-how-social-6421217

Another individuals petition- 
https://www.change.org/p/scottish-social-services-council-demand-an-investigation-into-north-ayrshire-social-services-department

https://www.theguardian.com/society/2015/jun/17/social-workers-under-scrutiny-parents-camera

There are websites, Facebook pages, petitions and protests to expose the damage done, families torn apart without reason.
attributes.background: Social workers in Scotland have been caught lying, even under oath! Individuals are being accommodated due to false information causing emotional harm and trauma. Having workers wear body cameras will reduce the risk of this occurring and ensure individuals are accommodated when they are at risk.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
